did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Records of the Virginia Credit Union League,
1991-1995
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 700 items in 4 Hollinger boxes, ca. 1.5 linear feet.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Records of the Virginia Credit Union League, 1991-1995, Accession #11102-a , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were given to the University of Virginia Library by William R. Wilkinson, Center for Comparative Medicine, Health Sciences Center, University of Virginia, on June 17, 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of the Virginia Credit Union League, 1991-1995, ca. 700 items (4 Hollinger boxes, ca. 1.5 linear feet), consists of minutes, reports, and various publications and notices, issued by the Virginia Credit Union League and sent to individual credit unions around the state. The minutes include those of the Virginia Credit Union League Annual Meeting and the Board of Directors Meetings, with an occasional report from the President.

The publications and notices folders contain printed material; memoranda; notices for training sessions, seminars, and conferences; order forms; news updates; notices for meetings; issues of The Virginia, the official publication of Virginia Credit Union League; information sheets; flyers; personnel and training manuals; and publications from individual Virginia Credit Union League committees.
